definitions.text: exactly alike; incapable of being perceived as different
examples: cars identical except for their license plates

definitions.text: being the exact same one; not any other:
examples: this is the identical room we stayed in before
the themes of his stories are one and the same
saw the selfsame quotation in two newspapers
the very thing he said yesterday
the very man I want to see

definitions.text: (of twins) derived from a single egg or ovum
having properties with uniform values along all axes
